entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or thunderstorms. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 then light in the morning. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
